description: This file defines a React functional component for the main notes management interface of a web application, handling displaying, creating, updating, and deleting notes using Supabase as backend.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the database for the current user and updates state.

methods.name: handleCreateNote
methods.description: Creates a new note in the database and updates the notes list.

methods.name: handleUpdateNote
methods.description: Updates the selected note in the database and updates the local state.

methods.name: handleDeleteNote
methods.description: Deletes the selected note from the database and updates the state.
